name: AdmitInpatient
title: Admit Inpatient
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a decision to admit a patient to an inpatient hospital setting.),(Data Element Scope: This value set is to identify a decision to admit a patient to an inpatient hospital setting.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with codes representing a decision to admit a patient to an inpatient hospital setting using the SNOMED CT system.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Transition of care from emergency department to acute care (finding)
